Class MessageOfTheDay

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.MessageOfTheDay

  • public class MessageOfTheDay
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a message of the day to be displayed in game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andreas Eleftheriades
